text: @NYGovCuomo Trump went on record stating we don’t need to test everyone for COVID-19 but we do. Testing all 347 million Americans will keep the death toll down & reopen the US sooner. Drug cos could make a killing on volume with an inexpensive mass test. PLS GET HIM TO DO IT!!! ❤️
